organizations.title: Whakahaere
organizations.no_organizations_description: Ka taea e ngā whakahaere te whakahaere i ngā rōpū maha me te utu me te whakahaere kotahi. Tīmata mā te waihanga i tō whakahaere tuatahi.
organizations.create_organization_description: Waihanga i tētahi whakahaere hou hei rōpū i ō rōpū
organizations.contact_email_help: Whakapā matua mō te utu me ngā whakamōhio whakahaere
organizations.billing_managed_by_default: Billing and subscription management is handled through your primary workspace. Visit your main workspace settings to manage payment methods and invoices.
organizations.organization_settings_description: Whakahou i tō ingoa whakahaere me te whakamārama
organizations.billing_coming_soon: Ka Tae Mai te Honohononga Utu
organizations.billing_coming_soon_description: Ka wātea te whakahaere utu me te ohaurunga kotahi mō ngā rōpū katoa i roto i tēnei whakahaere i tētahi putanga ā muri ake.
organizations.about_description: Ka whakarato ngā whakahaere i te utu me te whakahaere kotahi mō ngā rōpū maha. He kōwhiringa - ka taea e ngā rōpū te noho motuhake, te rōpū rānei i raro i tētahi whakahaere mō te whakahaere pokapū.
organizations.single_user_info_description: Whakahou i tō ingoa kamupene me ngā taipitopito whakahaere ki konei. Ka āwhina ēnei mōhiohio ki te whakamana i tō pūkete, ka taea hoki te whakamahi mō ngā āhuatanga waitohu ā muri ake.
organizations.getting_started_description: Waihanga i tō whakahaere tuatahi hei whakahaere i ngā mōhiohio kamupene me te whakareri mō ngā āhuatanga mahi tahi rōpū me te waitohu ā muri ake.
organizations.delete_organization_warning: Ka mukua pūmautia e tēnei te whakahaere me ngā rōpū hono katoa. Kāore tēnei mahi e taea te whakakore.
organizations.delete_organization_confirm_message: E tino hiahia ana koe ki te muku i {name}? Kāore tēnei mahi e taea te whakakore.

members.title: Members
members.description: Manage organization members and their roles
members.name: Name
members.no_members_description: This organization has no members yet.
members.remove_member_confirm: Are you sure you want to remove {name} from this organization?
members.cannot_change_own_role: You cannot change your own role
members.cannot_remove_self: You cannot remove yourself from the organization
members.cannot_remove_owner: You cannot remove the organization owner
members.insufficient_permissions: You do not have permission to manage members

role_descriptions.owner: Full access to all organization settings and members
role_descriptions.admin: Can manage members and most organization settings

invitations.title: Organization Invitations
invitations.must_sign_in: Please sign in to accept this invitation
